message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor, which is fair considering you lose 10% value each round if you decline.
Let's split it evenly. This way, we both get a fair share, and you don't have to worry about future rounds.
Since we're now in round 3, your $35 is worth even less to you due to 20% inflation. This offer is actually better for you than waiting another round. Let's conclude this now.
I'm willing to take a bit less to reach an agreement. This split considers the inflation impact on me and still gives you a good share.
At this point, your $30 after 40% inflation is equivalent to only $18 in original value. This is your best realistic option now - further delays will only reduce your value more.
